title: FS: T201 Nap Lajoie PSA 2.5 SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T201 Nap Lajoie PSA 2.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Really nice card for the grade and it sure looks like it could have graded a bit higher. The price is SOLD delivered PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for looking.

Joe K
